info.title: Trust Engine API
info.description: API for the Trust Engine protocol, providing services for file registration, verification, and wallet management.

get.description: Checks the operational status of the Trust Engine API server.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/health'

import requests

response = requests.get('https://core-api-server.onrender.com/health')
data = response.json()
print(data)

post.description: Create a new Solana wallet using managed service and link it to a user ID.

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$url = 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/create-wallet';
$data = json_encode([
    'userID' => 'user-12345'
]);

$options = [
    'http' => [
        'header' => 'Content-Type: application/json',
        'method' => 'POST',
        'content' => $data,
    ],
];

$context = stream_context_create($options);
$result = file_get_contents($url, false, $context);
$data = json_decode($result, true);

print_r($data);
?>

201.description: Wallet created successfully and linked to user ID

value.message: Success! Your managed wallet has been created and linked to your user ID.

409.description: Conflict - User ID already has a wallet or wallet already linked

details.suggestion: Use a different User ID or use the existing wallet
This should not happen with managed wallet creation

post.description: Register a new file using its content hash and metadata.

x-code-samples.source:
# Example 1: Managed wallet (automatic signing)
curl -X POST 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/register' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "contentTitle": "My Important Document",
    "walletAddress": "9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM",
    "walletType": "managed",
    "contentHash": "a7b2c3d4e5f6789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789"
  }'

# Example 2: Self wallet with action link (recommended)
curl -X POST 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/register' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "contentTitle": "My Important Document",
    "walletAddress": "9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM",
    "walletType": "self",
    "contentHash": "a7b2c3d4e5f6789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789",
    "returnActionLink": true
  }'

import requests

response = requests.post(
    'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/register',
    headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
    json={
        'contentTitle': 'My Important Document',
        'walletAddress': '9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM',
        'walletType': 'managed',
        'contentHash': 'a7b2c3d4e5f6789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789'
   }
)

data = response.json()
print(data)

<?php

$url = 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/register';
$data = json_encode([
    'contentTitle' => 'My Important Document',
    'walletAddress' => '9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM',
    'walletType' => 'managed',
    'contentHash' => 'a7b2c3d4e5f6789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789'
]);

$options = [
    'http' => [
        'header' => 'Content-Type: application/json',
        'method' => 'POST',
        'content' => $data,
    ],
];

$context = stream_context_create($options);
$result = file_get_contents($url, false, $context);
$data = json_decode($result, true);

print_r($data);
?>

200.description: Registration confirmed - Managed wallet transaction completed

value.message: âœ… Success! Your file has been registered and confirmed on-chain.

202.description: Registration accepted - Self wallet transaction prepared for signing or action link created

value.message: Transaction prepared and action link created. Use the link to sign the transaction.
Transaction prepared and pre-signed. Please sign and submit via your wallet.

409.description: Conflict - File already registered or missing user-wallet relation

details.suggestion: Use the /search endpoint to find the existing record.
Use the /link-wallet endpoint to link your wallet to a user ID first
details.alternative: Use the /create-wallet endpoint to create a new wallet with automatic user ID linking
details.findExisting: Use the /find-wallet endpoint to check if a relation already exists

post.description: Searches for existing on-chain registration records by content hash, with optional wallet address filtering.

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

// Example 1: Search by content hash only
$data1 = json_encode([
    'contentHash' => 'a665a45920422f9d417e4867efdc4fb8a04a1f3fff1fa07e998e86f7f7a27ae3'
]);

$context1 = stream_context_create([
    'http' => [
        'method' => 'POST',
        'header' => 'Content-Type: application/json',
        'content' => $data1
    ]
]);

$response1 = file_get_contents('https://core-api-server.onrender.com/search', false, $context1);
$result = json_decode($response1, true);

print_r($result);
?>

200.description: Search completed successfully with results found

value.message: Found 2 registration(s) for this content hash.

content-hash-and-wallet.summary: Search by Content Hash and Wallet Address

value.message: Found the specific registration for this content hash and wallet address.

no-specific-registration.summary: No Specific Registration Found (Content Hash + Wallet)

get.description: Find a wallet by user ID or wallet address.

x-code-samples.source:
# Example 1: Find by userID
curl -X GET 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/find-wallet?userID=user-12345'

# Example 2: Find by wallet address
curl -X GET 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/find-wallet?walletAddress=9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM'

<?php

// Example 1: Find by userID
$url1 = 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/find-wallet?' . http_build_query(['userID' => 'user-12345']);
$response1 = file_get_contents($url1);
$data1 = json_decode($response1, true);

// Example 2: Find by wallet address
$url2 = 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/find-wallet?' . http_build_query(['walletAddress' => '9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM']);
$response2 = file_get_contents($url2);
$data2 = json_decode($response2, true);

print_r($data1);
?>

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: User ID to search for (provide either this OR walletAddress)

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Wallet address to search for (provide either this OR userID)

value.message: Wallet relation found successfully using userID.
Wallet relation found successfully using walletAddress.

details.suggestion: Try using the wallet address instead, or create a new relation using /link-wallet
Try using the user ID instead, or create a new relation using /link-wallet

post.description: Links a user ID to a Solana wallet address by creating an on-chain relationship record.

x-code-samples.source:
import requests

response = requests.post(
    'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/link-wallet',
    headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
    json={
        'userID': 'user-12345',
        'walletAddress': '9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM'
    }
)

data = response.json()
print(data)

<?php

$url = 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/link-wallet';
$data = json_encode([
    'userID' => 'user-12345',
    'walletAddress' => '9WzDXwBbmkg8ZTbNMqUxvQRAyrZzDsGYdLVL9zYtAWWM'
]);

$options = [
    'http' => [
        'header' => 'Content-Type: application/json',
        'method' => 'POST',
        'content' => $data,
    ],
];

$context = stream_context_create($options);
$result = file_get_contents($url, false, $context);
$data = json_decode($result, true);

print_r($data);
?>

200.description: Wallet successfully linked to user ID

value.message: Success! The wallet address has been linked to the user ID.

409.description: Conflict - User ID or wallet already linked

details.suggestion: Use a different User ID or unlink the existing wallet first
Use a different wallet address or unlink the existing relation first

post.description: Initiates identity verification process for a wallet address using Self.xyz ZK identity verification.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/register/identity' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "walletAddress": "7xKXtg2CW87d97TXJSDpbD5jBkheTqA83TZRuJosgAsU",
    "disclosures": {
      "issuing_state": false,
      "name": true,
      "nationality": true,
      "date_of_birth": true,
      "passport_number": false,
      "gender": false,
      "expiry_date": false
    }
  }'

import requests

response = requests.post(
    'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/register/identity',
    headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
    json={
        'walletAddress': '7xKXtg2CW87d97TXJSDpbD5jBkheTqA83TZRuJosgAsU',
        'disclosures': {
            'issuing_state': False,
            'name': True,
            'nationality': True,
            'date_of_birth': True,
            'passport_number': False,
            'gender': False,
            'expiry_date': False
        }
    }
)

data = response.json()
print(data)

details.instructions: Visit the QR code URL and scan with Self app to verify your identity

value.message: You already have a pending identity verification session

details.instructions: Complete your existing verification or wait for it to expire before starting a new one

details.suggestion: Use the /link-wallet endpoint to link your wallet to a user ID first
details.alternative: Use the /create-wallet endpoint to create a new wallet with automatic user ID linking
details.findExisting: Use the /find-wallet endpoint to check if a relation already exists

get.description: Retrieves the current identity verification session status and verified data for a specific wallet address.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/identity/session/7xKXtg2CW87d97TXJSDpbD5jBkheTqA83TZRuJosgAsU' \
  -H 'Accept: application/json'

import requests

wallet_address = '7xKXtg2CW87d97TXJSDpbD5jBkheTqA83TZRuJosgAsU'
response = requests.get(
    f'https://core-api-server.onrender.com/identity/session/{wallet_address}',
    headers={'Accept': 'application/json'}
)

data = response.json()
print(data)

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Valid Solana wallet address (Base58 format) to check verification status for

details.suggestion: No identity verification session found for this wallet

post.description: Submits a pre-signed transaction to the Solana blockchain with server-side fee payment and confirmation.

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$data = json_encode([
    'transaction' => 'AQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAABAAEDArczbMia1tLmq2poQiNXU2xnkV4S4gK9bS6Kz...'
]);

$context = stream_context_create([
    'http' => [
        'method' => 'POST',
        'header' => 'Content-Type: application/json',
        'content' => $data
    ]
]);

$response = file_get_contents('https://core-api-server.onrender.com/transactions', false, $context);
$result = json_decode($response, true);

print_r($result);
?>

contentHash.description: SHA256 hash of the file content (hex encoded)

walletAddress.description: Optional wallet address to filter search results to specific registrations

searchCriteria.description: The search parameters that were used

contentHash.description: The content hash that was searched for
SHA256 hash of the file content

pdaAddress.description: Solana Program Derived Address for this registration

ipfsCid.description: IPFS Content Identifier for metadata storage

registeredBy.description: Wallet address that registered the file

userID.description: Associated user ID (null if no relation found)

timestamp.description: ISO timestamp when file was registered

explorerUrl.description: Link to view on Solana Explorer

message.description: Error message indicating no registrations were found

searchedContentHash.description: The content hash that was searched for

searchedWalletAddress.description: The wallet address that was searched for (if provided)

searchMode.description: The type of search that was performed

contentTitle.description: Title for the content being registered

contentHash.description: SHA256 hash of the file content (hex encoded)

fileMetadata.description: Metadata about the file being registered

returnActionLink.description: Return an action link for transaction signing (self wallets only). When true, instead of returning the raw transaction, an action link is generated for secure browser-based signing.

details.description: Submitted transaction details for managed wallets

contentRegistrationPDA.description: Program Derived Address for the content registration

contentHash.description: SHA256 hash of the registered file

ipfsCid.description: IPFS Content Identifier for the metadata

explorerUrl.description: Solana explorer URL for the transaction

details.description: Transaction preparation details for self wallets

transaction.description: Base64-encoded transaction ready for client signing

ipfsCid.description: IPFS Content Identifier for the metadata

contentRegistrationPDA.description: Program Derived Address for the content registration

contentHash.description: SHA256 hash of the registered file

message.description: Success message for action link creation

details.description: Action link details for secure transaction signing

actionLink.description: Secure URL for transaction signing via browser wallet

expiresAt.description: Expiration timestamp for the action link (ISO 8601)

contentHash.description: SHA256 hash of the registered file

walletAddress.description: The newly created Solana wallet address

transactionId.description: On-chain transaction ID for the wallet-user relationship

explorerUrl.description: Direct link to view the transaction on Solana Explorer

userID.description: User ID linked to the wallet

walletAddress.description: Valid Solana wallet address in Base58 format

userID.description: The user ID that was linked

walletAddress.description: The wallet address that was linked

transactionId.description: Solana transaction ID for the relationship creation

explorerUrl.description: Direct link to view the transaction on Solana Explorer

searchValue.description: The value that was searched for

userId.description: The user ID in the relationship

walletAddress.description: The wallet address in the relationship

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the relationship was created

relationPDA.description: Program Derived Address for this relationship

message.description: Error message indicating no relation was found

searchType.description: The type of search that was performed

searchValue.description: The value that was searched for

transactionId.description: The confirmed transaction ID on Solana

explorerUrl.description: Direct link to view the transaction on Solana Explorer

walletAddress.description: Wallet address to check balance for

disclosures.description: Object specifying which identity fields to request verification for. All 7 fields must be explicitly provided with boolean values.

issuing_state.description: Country/state that issued the ID document

message.description: Confirmation that the identity verification session was created

qrCodeUrl.description: URL for identity verification that can be opened in Self.xyz app

walletAddress.description: The wallet address for this verification session

selectedDisclosures.description: Object showing which identity fields were requested (only shows true values)

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the session was created

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the session expires (24 hours from creation)

message.description: Message indicating an existing pending session was found

walletAddress.description: The wallet address for this verification session

requestedDisclosures.description: All disclosure fields with boolean values

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the session was created

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the session expires

message.description: Error message describing the missing requirement

walletAddress.description: The wallet address that was checked

findExisting.description: How to check for existing relations

message.description: Error message indicating session not found

walletAddress.description: The wallet address that was searched

expiredAt.description: When the session expired (for expired sessions)

message.description: Confirmation that the session was retrieved successfully

walletAddress.description: The wallet address for this verification session

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the session was created

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the session expires (24 hours from creation)

verifiedAt.description: ISO timestamp when verification was completed (null if not yet verified)

requestedDisclosures.description: Object showing which identity fields were requested for verification

verifiedData.description: Contains the actual verified identity data (only present when status is 'verified')

verified_issuing_state.description: Country/state that issued the ID document

verified_name.description: Full name from the ID document

verified_date_of_birth.description: Date of birth from the document

self_user_id.description: Unique identifier from Self.xyz verification system
